thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Jed Borg

author: Jed Borg
title: Jed Borg
text: Received our package from Hoselink (quick response to order!) all items as shown and easy to setup. Can't believe its taken this long to go out and order the Hoselink products (received a great deal online - was the same as the TV adverts without the hassle of ongoing phone calls!) Would recommended anyone and everyone to go the Hoselink way, no drips or issues at all, and the best thing, its so simple to connect and disconnect the attachments that even the misses can use them! More beer time for me!! Win Win.
